remarks: Get a component of the ordered power series structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
opsrbas.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
opsrbas.o $e |- O = ( ( I ordPwSer R ) ` T ) $.
opsrbas.t $e |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) $.
opsrbaslem.1 $e |- E = Slot N $.
opsrbaslem.2 $e |- N e. NN $.
opsrbaslem.3 $e |- N < 10 $.
opsrbaslem $p |- ( ph -> ( E ` S ) = ( E ` O ) ) $.
